title: Morg's ult still says 2%/4%/6%
body: I'm still not sure how you can be stunned by a percentage, but can this be fixed?

replies.body: Morgana is secretly OP. Slapped a GA and a Gunblade on one the other day and she carried my team to #1. I added on a deathcap most the way through. SoS would have been even better.
Imagine being stunned for 8% dat shit broken
Yeah I really don't understand the percentage though Morg is actually a pretty strong T3 and is the best assassin killer in the game imo.
